run_juicer.descp: set up workspace and shell file to run juicer.
run_juicer._comments: set up workspace and shell file to run juicer (compatible to Umich Flux System)

juicerDump.descp: run juicer dump, and merge the inter-chr and intra-chr.
juicerDump._comments: run juicer dump, merge the inter-chr and intra-chr

FRAG_gene._comments: convert FRAG contacts to gene level contacts
FRAG_gene.descp: convert FRAG contacts to gene level contacts.

haplo_div._comments: divide the diploid haplotype (P/M) Hi-C reads from alignment
haplo_div.descp: divide the diploid haplotype (P/M) Hi-C reads from alignment.

juicer_db._comments: generate database for juicer and HaploHiC
juicer_db.descp: make database files for juicer and HaploHiC operations.

adjustDump._comments: adjust HaploHiC dump contacts based on juicer dump contacts.
adjustDump.descp: adjust HaploHiC dump contacts based on juicer dump contacts.
